## Section 3

1.  Find the slope of f(x) = x\^2 at x = 3

    ```{r}
    fx = expression(x^2)
    df_dx <- D(fx,'x')
    df_dx

    x = 3
    eval(df_dx)

    ```

2.  Find the slope of P(a) = ...

    ```{r}
    pa = expression(2*(3*a + 2)^4 - 5)

    df_da <- D(pa,'a')

    df_da

    a = 1.2
    eval(df_da)
    ```
